attributes.action: Roadside safety for recovery operators while loading
attributes.background: We need people to slow down and move over when safe to give the working recovery operators space to work. As it has been made the law in America and has been proven to work. As lately there has been numerous fatalities and serious injuries.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, your petition could ask Parliament to make a specific change to the law.
